name: Commander: C# Script Automation
summary: Create small C# based scripts to automate many operations in Markdown Monster. Shell out to external tools, pull in data from external source, update documents, merge data into the editor and more.
description:
Use this add-in to create add-in like behavior without the overhead. Use C# code to automate operations inside of Markdown Monster and tie the script to a hotkey. Some examples of you might do includes launching external tools (say your Git Client or automating a Git command), downloading, importing and merging data, posting custom content to custom services and much more.

With full access to C# code, the sky's the limit with what you can accomplish.
